text: @realDonaldTrump Not listening to a fraud who has been IMPEACHED! Are you aware that there a few important things going on in America that you should be focusing on? Here's a quick review: bounty on soldiers' heads paid 4 by your butt buddy; COVID19, remember that?; equality and race relations...
